name: Continent of Pendor
startIntroPart1: Pendor....  An old land that is full of war, religious activity, and simple people.  A kingdom once ruled all of the continent simply, and accordingly, named the Kingdom of Pendor.  However, a great tragedy struck the land...
startIntroPart2: On the North near the snowy Mystmountains, Gregory and Ursula are becoming more independent. On the South where the old Baccus Empire has landed, Marius and Demosthenes are showing signs of returning to their old ways. On the West near the Western Sea, Valdis and Inar are competing as per tribal Vanskerry customs. On the East near the Great Desert, Kadan and Xerxes are getting restless like their nomadic ancestors. On the center of the continent and heart of all Pendor, Ulric's and Darlion's ambitions are slowly getting bigger. Your dissapearance has disturbed Pendor once more. Oh, great champion! Quickly establish the Republic in this place and assure all your allies that remain in Pendor of your well-being. Have them know that you, their superior, is alive and aware of their every move.
declaringWar: Your fame runs before you! Let us test each other's valor on the battlefield!
attacked: You have the look of a mercenary, another vulture come to grow fat on the misery of this land.
defeated: I yield! Do yourself credit, and grant me the honors of war, as befitting my rank!
introduction: Ah, yes. At last we meet. You sound like a good person to know. Let us speak together, from time to time.
neutralHello: Peace to you, and always remember to temper your valor with mercy, your courage with honour.
hateHello: Normally I cut the throats of impudent commoners who barge into my presence uninvited, but I am in a good mood today.
tradeRequest: Men will always try to cheat others of their rightful due. In this faithless world, each must remain vigilant of his own rights.
